|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CommonPickerCssClasses](./datetime.commonpickercssclasses.md) | Shared css classes for all pickers |

|  [DateApiObject](./datetime.dateapiobject.md) | Instance of object wrapping TDate, allowing manipulation with it |
|  [DatePositionParser](./datetime.datepositionparser.md) | Parser used for parsing date using provided format and returning positions and selected date part |

|  [DateTimeValue](./datetime.datetimevalue.md) | Represents datetime value as period |
|  [DateTimeValueObject](./datetime.datetimevalueobject.md) | Represents object that holds data for indentification of validity of date time |
|  [DayData](./datetime.daydata.md) | Data that represents day in date picker |
|  [DayPickerCssClasses](./datetime.daypickercssclasses.md) | Specific css classes for day picker |
|  [FormatProvider](./datetime.formatprovider.md) | Format provider used for obtaining some special formats 'placeholders' |
|  [MonthData](./datetime.monthdata.md) | Data that represents month in date picker |
|  [MonthPickerCssClasses](./datetime.monthpickercssclasses.md) | Specific css classes for month picker |
|  [PeriodData](./datetime.perioddata.md) | Data that represents data for any picker type |

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DATE\_API](./datetime.date_api.md) | Injection token used for obtaining DateApi implementation |

|  [HOUR](./datetime.hour.md) | Represents hour component of datetime |
|  [MINUTE](./datetime.minute.md) | Represents minute component of datetime |

|  [YEAR](./datetime.year.md) | Represents year component of datetime |
